name: F. Dasha and Nightmares
statement:
Dasha, an excellent student, is studying at the best mathematical lyceum
in the country. Recently, a mysterious stranger brought n words
consisting of small latin letters s_1, s_2,
ldots, s_n to the lyceum. Since that day, Dasha has been tormented by
.Consider some pair of integers
langle i, j
rangle (1
le i
le j
le n). is a string for which it is true: It is obtained by concatenation
s_{i}s_{j}; Its length is ; The number of different letters in it is 25;
The number of occurrences of each letter that is in the word is . For
example, if s_i= "abcdefg" and s_j= "ijklmnopqrstuvwxyz", the pair
langle i, j
rangle creates a .Dasha will stop having if she counts their number.
There are too many , so Dasha needs your help. Count the number of
different . are called different if the corresponding pairs
langle i, j
rangle are different. The pairs
langle i_1, j_1
rangle and
langle i_2, j_2
rangle are called different if i_1
neq i_2 j_1
neq j_2.
